idea:
Sashakta India Private Limited is a technology, innovation, idea and practical expertise driven organization delivering Technology and Outsourcing solutions for Information Technology, Financial, Agriculture and Education fields.

The Company has also been recognized as “The Company of the Year” in India.

We are also SAP Partner in SAP Education.

We are planning to consult, design, deliver and manage enterprise, technology and information solutions, to help customers maximize the value from their return of investments by bridging the execution gap between planning and operational reality. We are planning to bring in proactiveness and innovations to protect customers from the uncertainties of future and keep them on the track of latest technologies with simultaneous pace.
name: SASHAKTA INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
